cam_spacing: Spatially independent,Ideally ≥ 1 km, but closer may be justified,1-2 km is often adequate

num_cams: As many as possible,Ideally ≥ 50,≥ 20 per stratum
Activity patterns: Enough to obtain > 100 detections
survey_duration: Dependent on behavioural metric (e.g. if it occurs during a certain period)
